PAGE_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: 404 - Page not found
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.MESSAGE: The requested page does not exist.

LEGAL_NOTICE.PARAGRAPH_5_DDG: Information according to ยง 5 DDG
LEGAL_NOTICE.LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_1: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no influence.
LEGAL_NOTICE.LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_2: Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked
LEGAL_NOTICE.LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_3: pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations
LEGAL_NOTICE.LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_4: at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking. A permanent content control of the linked pages is
LEGAL_NOTICE.LIABILITY_FOR_LINKS_TEXT_5: however, not reasonable without concrete evidence of a legal violation. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
LEGAL_NOTICE.PRIVACY_TEXT_1: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. Insofar as personal data (e.g., name, address, or email addresses) is collected on our pages,
LEGAL_NOTICE.PRIVACY_TEXT_2: this is always done on a voluntary basis, if possible. This data will not be disclosed to third parties without your express consent.
LEGAL_NOTICE.PRIVACY_TEXT_3: We point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., communication by email) can have security gaps. Complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
LEGAL_NOTICE.PRIVACY_TEXT_4: The use of contact data published within the scope of the imprint obligation by third parties for sending unsolicited advertising and information materials is hereby expressly contradicted. The operators of the pages expressly reserve the right to take legal action in the event of unsolicited sending of advertising information, for example by spam emails.
